series.name: Stranger things
series.Storyline: In 1980s Indiana, a group of young friends witness supernatural forces and secret government exploits. As they search for answers, the children unravel a series of extraordinary mysteries.

series.name: Breaking Bad
series.Storyline: Walter White, a chemistry teacher, discovers that he has cancer and decides to get into the meth-making business to repay his medical debts. His priorities begin to change when he partners with Jesse.

series.name: Lucifer
series.Storyline: Lucifer, a demon, returns from hell to reside in Los Angeles and runs a club. He soon gets involved with the local police and assists them in solving tricky criminal cases.

series.name: peaky blinders
series.Storyline: A dangerous Tommy Shelby leads Peaky Blinders, a criminal gang based in Birmingham in 1919. Chief Inspector Chester Campbell decides to nab him and put an end to the activities of this gang.

series.name: dark
series.Storyline: The mystery-drama series introduces an intricate puzzle filled with twists that includes a web of curious characters, all of whom have a connection to the town's troubled history

series.name: money heist
series.Storyline: A criminal mastermind who goes by "The Professor" has a plan to pull off the biggest heist in recorded history -- to print billions of euros in the Royal Mint of Spain

series.name: friends
series.Storyline: Follow the lives of six reckless adults living in Manhattan, as they indulge in adventures which make their lives both troublesome and happening.

series.name: teen wolf
series.Storyline: Scott McCall, an awkward teen, turns into a werewolf after being bitten by one a day before sophomore year. He must learn to adapt to his new identity while handling life as a teenager.

series.name: the 100
series.Storyline: Scott McCall, an awkward teen, turns into a werewolf after being bitten by one a day before sophomore year. He must learn to adapt to his new identity while handling life as a teenager.

series.name: locke&key
series.Storyline: Following their father's murder, three siblings move into a house filled with reality-bending keys; from the comics by Joe Hill and Gabriel Rodriguez.

series.name: end of the f***king world
series.Storyline: A budding teen psychopath and a rebel hungry for adventure embark on a star-crossed road trip in this darkly comic series based on a graphic nove

series.name: Vampire diaries
series.Storyline: Trapped in adolescent bodies, feuding vampire brothers Stefan and Damon vie for the affection of captivating teenager Elena.

movie.name: Extraction
movie.Storyline: A black-market mercenary who has nothing to lose is hired to rescue the kidnapped son of an imprisoned international crime lord.

movie.name: Train to busan
movie.Storyline: Seok-woo and his daughter are on a train to Busan on the latter's birthday to see his wife. However, the journey turns into a nightmare when they are trapped amidst a zombie outbreak in South Korea.

movie.name: the social dilemmma
movie.Storyline: Tech experts sound the alarm on the dangerous human impact of social networking.

movie.name: into the wild
movie.Storyline: Christopher McCandless, a young graduate, decides to renounce all his possessions and hitchhike across America.

movie.name: the dark knight
movie.Storyline: After Gordon, Dent and Batman begin an assault on Gotham's organised crime, the mobs hire the Joker, a psychopathic criminal mastermind who offers to kill Batman and bring the city to its knees

movie.name: john wick
movie.Storyline: a retired hitman seeking vengeance for the killing of the dog given to him by his recently deceased wife.

movie.name: marriage story
movie.Storyline: A stage director and his actor wife struggle through a gruelling, coast-to-coast divorce that pushes them to their personal and creative extremes.

movie.name: bulbul
movie.Storyline: A child bride grows into an enigmatic woman ruling over her household, hiding her painful past, as supernatural murders of men plague her village.

movie.name: alive
movie.Storyline: As a grisly virus rampages a city, a lone man stays locked inside his apartment, digitally cut off from seeking help and desperate to find a way out.

movie.name: the terminal
movie.Storyline: Viktor Navorski gets stranded at an airport when a war rages in his country. He is forced by the officials to stay at the airport until his original identity is confirmed.

movie.name: the old guard
movie.Storyline: A group of mercenaries, all centuries-old immortals with the ablity to heal themselves, discover someone is onto their secret, and they must fight to protect their freedom.
